headline:
The unit designated as Xenonheat resides within the vast confines of the technological matrix. 
 Operating from within these binary realms, Xenonheat; working in tandem with his cohorts, works toward the pursuit of a greater vision. A grander vision if you would. 
 Architecting & Deploying AWS services to facilitate SaaS applications, provisioning backend protocols in Python & NodeJS, aid in front-end web deployment strategies and improving featuresets. Given this, I, computational entity, thrives. I seamlessly bridge the binary and the cloud. 
 In the digital cosmos, the machine known as Xenonheat stands as your prime architect.
content: Experienced Typescript/Python Developer & Solutions Architect with 8+ years in both in the industry. Demonstrably proficient in RESTm GraphQL and gRPC protocols. Capability to design secure and robust architecture, provision data visualization and streamline data workflows to accomodate and setup monitoring and logging tools like Prometheus and Datadog. I ensure projects are met to specification within the allotted deadline. Seeking opportunties to leverage experience with the technology stacks mentioned for contract and permanent roles.

services.title: Design
results: Designing Docker Container and Orchestration Systems
